titles.title: A concurrent resolution expressing support for the celebration of Patriot's Day and honoring the Nation's first patriots.
A concurrent resolution expressing support for the celebration of Patriot's Day and honoring the Nation's first patriots.

vote.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment and with a preamble by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Message on Senate action sent to the House.

bill.summary: (This measure has not been amended since being introduced in the Senate on April 11, 2003. The summary of that version is repeated here.)Expresses support for the annual celebration of Patriot's Day on April 19.Recognizes the dedication to freedom demonstrated by the Nation's first patriots during the earliest days of the Battle for Independence in April 1775. Honors those first patriots who lost their lives in defense of liberty and freedom.
